questionTitle: Which of the following is a key cloud service attribute?
questionExplanation: Each provider has a unique solution, uses its own APIs, and provides unique services.

questionOption1: The cloud turns physical systems into virtual systems
questionOption2: The printing service decided to eliminate infrastructure and streamline the process
questionOption3: The first stage in the redeployment is to eliminate the local processing associated with the scanning machines
questionExplanation: Organizations choose to deploy systems to the cloud entirely when they can recreate the essential part of their process and eliminate infrastructure.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the first level cloud service attribute?
questionExplanation: Accounting is second level attribute in accordance with Core services.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a second level cloud attribute in relation to Platform Features?
questionExplanation: Testing and application attribute is also considered second level cloud attribute for platform features.

questionOption1: Virtual machines are not provisioned to process the scans
questionOption3: Infrastructure, storage, and the queuing system all come together to eliminate a great deal of cost and operational complexity
questionExplanation: This is a pure cloud play.

questionTitle: Which of the following is not a second level cloud attribute in relation to Storage?
questionExplanation: Language and locale attribute is a second level attribute in relation to platform feature.

questionTitle: Which of the following scenario can be referred to as cloud bursting?
questionOption1: Part of the application is on a local system, and part is in the cloud
questionOption2: Complete part of the application is on local system
questionOption3: Complete part of the application is on local system
questionExplanation: Each cloud platform also has its own set of attributes that need to be mapped.

questionTitle: Which of the following is not a first level cloud service attribute?
questionExplanation: These are key features for any cloud application.

questionTitle: An application that provides for transaction overflow in a reservation system is an example of ____________
questionExplanation: Most systems built to perform cloud bursting have a simple underlying design.

questionTitle: Which of the following is not a second level cloud attribute?
questionExplanation: Database is a second level cloud attribute for Application.
